Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダの二人の族長、捕まっちまったけど、 あいつら、どうなるんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: So, what's going to happen to Razilda's two chiefs now that they've been apprehended?

Entry.JapaneseText: 投獄されるだけで済むだろうが、この世情だ。 しばらくは出て来られんだろうな。
Entry.EnglishText: Given the state of the world, they may get away with just being incarcerated. They likely won't be out for a while, though.

Entry.JapaneseText: これをきっかけに、この街のみんなも 仲良くなるといいんだけどね……
Entry.EnglishText: It would be great if the people in this town used this opportunity to learn to get along, but...
